item.description:
Here's a cuisine EDEMG has not explored yet...Peruvian!

Although it's hard to specify what exactly constitutes Peruvian food (meat and potatoes are key ingredients), Piolin is supposed to be one of the best Peruvian restaurants in Hartford. It looks like a hole in the wall from the outside, but true EDE's know that those types of restaurants usually serve the best food.

Here's one review (2nd one listed): http://www.associated...

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: A Taste of Peru--Piolin in Hartford
